mapper.sql: ID, AMPUTATED, CREATED_DATE_TIME, CREATED_USER_ID, CREATED_USER_NAME, DESCRIPTION, DISPLAY_ORDER, IS_TIMING, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, RECEIVE_EMPLOYEE_NAME, RECEIVE_TELEPHONE, STATE, TIMING_TIME, TYPE,IS_REPLY,REPLY_LIMIT_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into SMS_SEND (ID, AMPUTATED, CREATED_DATE_TIME, CREATED_USER_ID, CREATED_USER_NAME, DESCRIPTION, DISPLAY_ORDER, IS_TIMING, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, RECEIVE_EMPLOYEE_NAME, RECEIVE_TELEPHONE, STATE, TIMING_TIME, TYPE,IS_REPLY,REPLY_LIMIT_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amputated,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isTiming,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveEmployeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{timingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isReply,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{replyLimitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into SMS_SEND
ID,
AMPUTATED,
CREATED_DATE_TIME,
CREATED_USER_ID,
CREATED_USER_NAME,
DESCRIPTION,

STATE,

IS_REPLY,
REPLY_LIMIT_DATE,
TYPE,

mapper.update:
update SMS_SEND
AMPUTATED = #{amputated,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_DATE_TIME = #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_USER_ID = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_USER_NAME = #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPLAY_ORDER = #{displayOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_TIMING = #{isTiming,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID = #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVE_EMPLOYEE_NAME = #{receiveEmployeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVE_TELEPHONE = #{receiveTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TIMING_TIME = #{timingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_REPLY = #{isReply,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPLY_LIMIT_DATE = #{replyLimitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SMS_SEND set AMPUTATED = #{amputated,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_DATE_TIME = #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_USER_ID = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_USER_NAME = #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAY_ORDER = #{displayOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_TIMING = #{isTiming,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID = #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVE_EMPLOYEE_NAME = #{receiveEmployeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVE_TELEPHONE = #{receiveTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TIMING_TIME = #{timingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_REPLY = #{isReply,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPLY_LIMIT_DATE = #{replyLimitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select s.ID,s.RECEIVE_EMPLOYEE_NAME,s.RECEIVE_TELEPHONE,s.TYPE,s.DESCRIPTION,ROWNUM from (select ID,RECEIVE_EMPLOYEE_NAME,RECEIVE_TELEPHONE,TYPE,TIMING_TIME,DESCRIPTION,ROWNUM from SMS_SEND where AMPUTATED=0 and RECEIVE_TELEPHONE = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CREATED_DATE_TIME < to_date(#{sendTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and STATE = 1 order by CREATED_DATE_TIME desc)s where rownum=1

select
from SMS_SEND where state != 1
name like '%'||#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and
DESCRIPTION like '%'||#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and
IS_TIMING = #{isTiming,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
order by state,CREATED_DATE_TIME desc

select
from SMS_SEND where state = 1
name like '%'||#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and
DESCRIPTION like '%'||#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and
IS_TIMING = #{isTiming,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
order by state,CREATED_DATE_TIME desc

SELECT s.ID,s.sendTime,s.sendName,s.sendTel,s.sendContent,ROWNUM from (select SS."ID" as ID , ss.CREATED_DATE_TIME as sendTime, SS.RECEIVE_EMPLOYEE_NAME as sendName, SS.RECEIVE_TELEPHONE as sendTel, SS.DESCRIPTION as sendContent from SMS_SEND ss WHERE SS."TYPE" = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and SS.RECEIVE_TELEPHONE=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SS.AMPUTATED=0 ORDER BY SS.CREATED_DATE_TIME desc)s where ROWNUM = 1
